item.title: Bethany add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "I love, therefore I am vulnerable." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Oswald Chambers
item.description: "We always know when Jesus is at work because He produces in the commonplace something that is inspiring." -- Oswald Chambers

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Oswald Chambers
item.description: "God plants His saints in the most useless places. We say, 'God intends me to be here because I am so useful.' Jesus never estimated His life along the line of the greatest use. God puts His saints where they will glorify Him, and we are no judge at all of where that is." -- Oswald Chambers

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Rick Warren
item.description: "The best use of life is love. The best expression of love is time. The best time to love is now." -- Rick Warren

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Mike L. Hopper
item.description: "Some adventures should never be repeated." -- Mike L. Hopper

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Deanna Kahler
item.description: "Even though you weren't born to us, you grew in our hearts. We will be forever connected because love is what makes a family." -- Deanna Kahler

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Karen Abbott
item.description: "Well, just remember this. When my ma got me, she picked what she wanted. But when your ma got you, she had to take what she got." -- Karen Abbott

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Nia Vardalos
item.description: "I am so touched at how my family has embraced my situation. They don't even know this child, and they already love her." -- Nia Vardalos

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Jody Cantrell Dyer
item.description: "Adoption is grief in reverse." -- Jody Cantrell Dyer

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Jana Wolff
item.description: "By adopting, I was not a full-fledged mother in their eyes. I hadn't paid the price of pregnancy, hadn't earned the badge of labor or the award for delivery, and would forever be an outside --an associate member at best. I looked like the other women, but I felt like less of one." -- Jana Wolff

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Susan Cain
item.description: "Evangelicalism has taken the Extrovert Ideal to its logical extreme...If you don't love Jesus out loud, then it must not be real love. It's not enough to forge your own spiritual connection to the divine; it must be displayed publicly." -- Susan Cain

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Susan Cain
item.description: "The same person who would never raise his hand in a lecture hall of two hundred people might blog to two thousand, or two million, without thinking twice. The same person who finds it difficult to introduce himself to strangers might establish a persence online and then extend these relationships into the real world." -- Susan Cain

item.title: Bethany add a quote by Ariel Gore
item.description: "The last introvert in a world of extroverts. Silence: my response to both emptiness and saturation. But silence frightens people. I had to learn how to talk. Out of politeness." -- Ariel Gore
